content.rendered:
Thursday, November 21, 2024
Today is a “A” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • Picture Re-Take & Make-Up Days for students and staff will be Monday, November 25th and Tuesday, November 26th. Students should go during their scheduled Flex Class. Staff can go anytime between 10:00 -2:00. Location for Re-Take /Make-Up days will be the Auditorium Lobby.
  • Girl’s 7th and 8th grade modified Basketball tryouts are Monday 11/25 and Tuesday 11/26 3pm-5pm in the back gym.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is your
